description: Rich chicken curry with aromatic spices
ingredients: Chicken, Onion, Tomato, Oil, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Clove, Star Anise, Curry Leaf, Garlic Ginger Paste, Kolambu Molaga Thool, Chicken Masala, Coriander Powder, Garam Masala, Red Chilli Powder, Coconut Chutni, Cashew Nut, Fennel Seed
instructions:
1. Heat oil, add whole spices and sauté.
2. Add onions, garlic ginger paste, and cook till golden.
3. Add tomatoes and spices, cook till oil separates.
4. Add chicken and cook till done.
5. Add coconut chutni and cashew nuts, simmer.
6. Serve hot with rice or chapathi.

description: Traditional South Indian coconut chutney with mustard and curry leaves
ingredients: Mustard Urad Dal(Kadugu Uluntha Parupu), Curry Leaves(Karuvepulai), Green Chilli, Oil, Fried Gram Split(Pottu Kadalai), Coconut
instructions:
1. Dry roast mustard urad dal and fried gram split.
2. Grind roasted dals, coconut, green chilli and curry leaves with salt.
3. Heat oil and add mustard seeds and curry leaves for tempering.
4. Mix tempering into chutney and serve fresh.

description: Flavorful rice cooked with coconut and spices
ingredients: Ginger, Urad Dal(ulunda parupu), Kadalai Parupu(bengal gram), Curry Leaves(Karuvepulai), Bheemas Rice, Coconut
instructions:
1. Cook rice separately and keep aside.
2. Heat oil and fry urad dal, bengal gram, ginger and curry leaves.
3. Add grated coconut and sauté briefly.
4. Mix in cooked rice and combine well.
5. Serve hot with pickle or sambar.

description: Classic South Indian filter coffee with milk and sugar

instructions: 1. Brew strong coffee decoction using coffee powder.\n2. Boil milk and mix with brewed coffee.\n3. Add sugar to taste and serve hot.

description: Comforting curd rice tempered with spices and herbs

instructions:
1. Cook rice and let it cool.
2. Mix curd into rice.
3. Prepare tempering with mustard, dals, ginger, curry leaves.
4. Add tempering and coriander leaves to curd rice.
5. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
